name: OR_CASE_PROC_CARE_PROTCL
description: This table stores the list of clinical protocols a patient is on for their procedure such as enhanced recovery.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CASE_PROC_PROTCL_C_NAME
columns.description: A list of clinical protocols the patient is on for their procedure such as enhanced recovery.
